Y(13715) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these {i,j}: {376, 15022}

Y(13715) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): {30, 15022, 376}, {381, 10304, 3090}, {381, 15682, 11001}, {381, 15689, 3628}, {3090, 15691, 3524}, {3528, 12102, 4}, {3543, 8703, 15682}, {3544, 11001, 12100}, {3627, 12101, 15685}, {3830, 3845, 17578}, {5055, 15700, 632}, {8703, 15682, 11541}, {8703, 15701, 15705}, {15685, 15716, 15691}, {32787, Z83549, Z83543}, {32788, Z83550, Z83544}
